text:
Wetherspoons brawl video catches 100-man bar fight in Trowbridge pub 
Footage of the chaotic clash has been viewed 500,000 times By AMANDA DEVLIN 13th February 2017, 12:00 pm THIS is the shocking moment a mass bar brawl broke out as punters beat each other senseless. 
The chaotic scenes show scored of grown men throwing punches as music plays in the background in the early hours of Sunday morning. Facebook: Tommy Arkle A mass brawl broke out inside a Wetherspoons pub in Trowbridge Facebook: Tommy Arkle Fists were flying as a crowd of up to 100 men got caught up in a violent fight inside a pub Facebook: Tommy Arkle 7 A video of the clash has been viewed 500,000 times 
A police officer was struck in the face as he tried to break up the free-for-all inside The Albany Palace, JD Wetherspoon in Trowbridge, Wiltshire. 
Footage of the men coming to blows has already been viewed more than 500,000 times. 
Tommy Arkle, who uploaded a clip of the fist fight to Facebook on Sunday morning, said the night got ‚Äúway out of hand‚Äù. Were you caught up in the chaos and know why the fight broke out? Email or call 0207 7824177 Caught in the crossfire was 22-year-old Nick Smith who told the The Sun Online: ‚ÄúEverything is a blur because it happened so quickly. ‚ÄúI was walking to the bar when everything just went mental. ‚ÄúThe last thing I remember is being punched in the eye and then being bottled. ‚ÄúI‚Äôve got a slashed eye and two lumps on my head.‚Äù Nick Smith 7 Reveller Nick Smith, 22, was bottled as he enjoyed a night out in a Trowbridge pub 
Injured Nick managed to push his way out of the crowd moments before police arrived to defuse the situation. 
Thankfully, he escaped without any long-lasting injuries. 
JD Wetherspoon chiefs have condemned the clash, saying they have ‚Äúnever encountered‚Äù anything like it. 
It‚Äôs not yet known what sparked the mass brawl. Nick‚Äôs friend Tommy, 21, who filmed the dramatic footage, told The Sun Online: ‚ÄúThe whole thing made my heart race. 
‚ÄúI had just come back from the bar when all of a sudden I heard shouting and then that was it. 
‚ÄúI think it just started between three guys, but then it turned into a free-for-all. 
‚ÄúThere have been fights in the past there but nothing to this extreme. 
The whole thing made my heart race. Tommy Arkle filmed the video 
‚ÄúI managed to stay out of the way and just film it on my phone. 
‚ÄúYou didn‚Äôt know where to look because there was just so much going on.‚Äù 
One person who watched the video commented: ‚ÄúAlcohol and testosterone don‚Äôt mix well, everyone just wants to fight the world.‚Äù 
Another said: ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt even understand how anything can get so out of hand. Absolutely mad.‚Äù Facebook: Tommy Arkle Men can be seen piled up on top of one another as the throw punches Facebook: Tommy Arkle It is not yet known why the tussle turned nasty on Saturday night Facebook: Tommy Arkle Punters can be seen getting whacked on the back as they tried to dodge punches 
One person has been charged with being in possession of a knife, police said. 
Officers are now appealing for witnesses to come forward if they have information about the incident. 
A spokesman for JD Wetherspoon said: ‚ÄúWe completely condemn the action of a large number of people at our pub in Trowbridge. Trowbridge has really made a names for itself this week and it's not a good oneüòÇ

‚ÄúThe incident caused distress to our staff and regular customers. 
‚ÄúThe pub has never encountered an incident like this. 
‚ÄúWe will work with the police to ensure that those involved are brought to justice.‚Äù 
The Sun Online has attempted to contact Wiltshire Police for comment.
